content: ग्राहिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [ग्रह् णिनि] {@--1@} Seizing, taking, holding. {@--2@} Picking, gathering. {@--3@} Containing. {@--4@} Drawing, attracting, alluring. {@--5@} Obtaining, gaining. {@--6@} Searching through, scrutinizing. {@--7@} Choosing, selecting {@--8@} Perceiving, observing. {@--9@} Accepting. {@--10@} Astringent. {@--11@} Obstructing. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} The wood-apple tree. --णी Adverse fate (प्रतिकूला).
